issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: SNN will not upload fsimage on IOE and Interrupted exceptions

comments.body:
we should update {{lastUploadTime}} and {{isPrimaryCheckpointer}} when there is no exception only.

Uploading the patch, kindly review.

This message was automatically generated.
[~brahmareddy]: can you please add a test case ?

[~brahmareddy], thanks for the patch. 

# We should have an AND instead of OR here to capture the case of no exception.
  {code} if (ie == null || ioe == null) {code}
# {{isPrimaryCheckPointer}} should be outside the if condition. If the ANN update was not successful, then isPrimaryCheckPointer should be set to false.

Thanks [~shahrs87] and [~hkoneru] for taking look into this issue.

bq.We should have an AND instead of OR here to capture the case of no exception.
Yup, I missed.
bq.isPrimaryCheckPointer should be outside the if condition. If the ANN update was not successful, then isPrimaryCheckPointer should be set to false.
In non-exception case, {{success=false}}, if ANN fails to update, so that will be assigned to {{false}} only

Uploaded the patch kindly review.
